tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NNP Twitter)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (DT a) (NNP BlackBerry)) (SBAR (S (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ ugly))))) (: :) (NP (NN l))))))
